full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Mattress Foam

**Notice of Tender**

**Project Title**: Mattress Foam Procurement

**Contract Title**: Matras Tissu Facon

### Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the supply of fire-resistant foam mattresses to Correctional Service of Canada.

### Notice Details

| Notice Details | |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-__PR-776-81416 |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Solicitation Number** | 21C11-225573/A |
| **Publication Date** | 2022-10-04 |
| **Tender Closing Date**  | 2022-11-17T14:00:00 |
| **Amendment Date** | 2022-11-11 |

### Description of Goods and Services

This procurement is for a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply of foam mattresses with a fire-resistant neoprene compound and convoluted cushioning core. The estimated annual quantity is 13,050 units.

### Requirements

* The goods must meet the technical requirements specified in Annex "A" of the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO).
* Delivery is required to various locations in Canada, including Federal Training Centre, Dorchester Institution, Atlantic Institution, and Drumheller Institution.

### Tendering Procedure

* The price of Canadian goods and services shall be the determining factor in the tender evaluation process.
* The Phased Commercial Compliance Process (PBCP) applies to this procurement.

### Instructions to Bidders

* All inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at least 7 calendar days prior to the bid closing date.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

### Point of Contact

* Name: Camille Dorion
* Email: camille.dorion@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (873) 354-9895

This notice is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) and is a notice of a competitive procurement arising from a trade agreement between Canada and other countries, specifically the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
